snippet: Early indications were decent, with the aluminum maker Alcoa reporting that it swung to a profit for the fourth quarter.
abstract: Stocks rise after corporate earnings get off to good start.
lead_paragraph: Early indications were decent, with the aluminum maker Alcoa reporting that it swung to a profit for the fourth quarter.

headline.seo: Shares Rise as Companies Report Earnings
headline.main: Shares Rise as Companies Begin to Report Earnings
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Companies Begin to Report Earnings
